Title: Personalized Defect Prediction
Elements_risk_assessment:
The lines that the bug-fixing changes modified are assumed to be the location of a bug.
     This approach has a precision of 75–88% in identifying bug-fixing commits in our data set
Summary:
personalized defect prediction—building a separate prediction model
     for each developer to predict software defects.
Outcome: personalized approach can discover up to 155 more bugs than the traditional change classification
